page.title: 01 A GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area allocated to our group is a twelve square kilometer area to the North-East of Reading. It is a mostly agricultural area containing the villages of Binfield Heath and Shiplake Row plus the North- East sector of Caversham Park village, which is a parish of Reading.This small area is part of the county of Berkshire, whilst the rest of the area is in "rural" Oxfordshire. In the following pages we will attempt to give an account of the area's more interesting features and the use of the land agriculturaly for crop growing and other uses, natural or man made.
